mana_craft.api

接口 IItemManaDamagable

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface IItemManaDamagable
    implement this to be a mana tool, weapon or armor for a tool or weapon, mana is dropped automatically by ManaCraft

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getManaValue() 
      default void onArmorBroken(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entity, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      for a mana armor, you should implement IDefaultSpecialArmor, then just call this method when IDefaultSpecialArmor.onArmorBroken(EntityLivingBase, ItemStack, DamageSource, int, IDefaultSpecialArmor.EnumArmorType) is on

    • 方法详细资料

      • getManaValue

        int getManaValue()
        返回:
        mana value, which decides how much mana can be dropped

      • onArmorBroken

        default void onArmorBroken(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entity,
                           @Nonnull
                           net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        for a mana armor, you should implement IDefaultSpecialArmor, then just call this method when IDefaultSpecialArmor.onArmorBroken(EntityLivingBase, ItemStack, DamageSource, int, IDefaultSpecialArmor.EnumArmorType) is on
        参数:
        entity - whose armor is broken
        stack - the armor item
